# rrum

The goal of rrum is to provide an implementation of Gibbs sampling algorithm 
for Bayesian Estimation of reduced Reparametrized Unifed Model (rRUM),
described by Culpepper and Hudson (2017) <doi: 10.1177/0146621617707511>.

## Installation

You can install rrum from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("tmsalab/rrum")
```
